itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Dan Hollaway discuss Mat's book THANK YOU FOR MY SERVICE hitting the New York Times Best Seller list, how grateful we are to the entire Drinkin' Bros community, and Mat answers all of your questions live on air.
